snippet.title: Bullet Express - Official Trailer
snippet.description:
To download our demo go to: 
https://lazygems.itch.io/
or 
https://gamejolt.com/games/BulletExpress/490457

We are the developers of Bullet Express, and are happy to introduce new content on weekly basis on our game development journey.
Bullet Express is a Rouge-Like shooter with RPG elements and gun synergies as a core mechanic.
Rush through the bullet express as you loot, level up and merge your guns to their ultimate form!
 Join our Social Medias for weekly updates on the game!
Itch.io: https://lazygems.itch.io/
GameJolt : https://gamejolt.com/games/BulletExpress/490457
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/BulletExpress/
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BulletExpres...
Instagram : https://www.instagram.com/lazygemsgames/
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LazyGems
